p: In choosing the next Editor-in-Chief, I am delighted to pass the baton to a fellow marathoner (literally), Dr. Melissa Grady, Professor of Social Work at The Catholic University of America. Melissa is an eminent and prolific scholar-researcher-practitioner who maintains an abiding belief in the efficacy of clinical social work. As my leg of the race concludes, I am excited for the next chapter of the CSWJ, and confident that Melissa will be dedicated to the task at hand. I am also confident that Melissa can count on you to support her vision for the CSWJ.
